CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier Newspaper, January 3, 1953, pg. 11, reads: "Leading Characters - Playing major roles in the Christmas cantata, 'Babe of Bethlehem,' at Park Place AME Church, Homestead, were the following: Armstrong Thomas, Walter Bill, Claire Ford and Samuel Staples.  The cantata was directed by Mrs. Catherine C. Gardner. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Men and women wearing costumes for "Babe of Bethlehem" Christmas cantata, first row from left: Elma Veney, Ethel Harris, Martha Henson, Dorothy Ford, unknown; second row: Julia West, Mozella Baker, Mary Black, Myrtle Wall, Catherine Cardwell Gardner, Laura Williams, Arlene Ford, Mary Bumry, Maggie, Theresa Harrison, Adelaide Montgomery, Thena Croons; third row: Armstrong Thomas, Claire Ford, Walter Bill, and Samuel Staples in Park Place AME Church, Homestead
